StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetDrugUse]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ProspectID uniqueiden..er = NULL, @DrugUseID uniqueiden..er = NULL AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT ProspectDrugUseId ,ProspectId ,d.DrugTypeId ,d.DrugTypeDisposi.on ,OtherDrug ,DrugLastUsed ,DrugFirstUse ,Detail ,NumberOfTimeUsed FROM USMC.ProspectDrugUse pdu JOIN USMC.DrugType d ON pdu.DrugTypeId = d.DrugTypeId WHERE (@ProspectID IS NULL OR ProspectId = @ProspectID) AND (@DrugUseID IS NULL OR ProspectDrugUseId = @DrugUseID) ORDER BY DrugLastUsed Desc
END
